start.title: Account Merge
start.subtitle: Merge (delete) an account on the XRP Ledger and move funds to one of your other accounts, to retrieve the XRP base reserve.
start.description: This xApp will help you 'merge' two accounts on the XRP Ledger
start.list_header: To continue, here are the requirements:
start.list_item_1: ) The two accounts must both be activated on the XRP ledger. This means that both of them must have met the XRP Ledger base reserve of 20 XRP. You can not activate a new account with the Account merge xApp.
start.list_item_2: Both accounts must be managed by XUMM. You can not use the xApp to merge an account in XUMM with an account managed by another wallet.
start.list_item_3: The XRP Ledger has a 5 XRP fee for deleting an account. The fee for deleting an account on the Ledger is burned. This fee was implemented to prevent malicious use and discourage people from creating multiple accounts that serve no purpose. XUMM has nothing to do with this fee.
start.list_item_4: The account that you wish to delete must not have any TrustLines, escrows or payment channels.
start.list_item_5: All other funds and NFTs should be transferred out of the account that is to be deleted.
start.list_item_6: If you are unclear about any of these requirements or need clarification, please contact Xumm support before proceeding.

step_0.body: Select the account which you wish to delete

wizard.success: Your funds have been migrated and your account has been successfully deleted

error.title: Oops
error.reactNative: This webpage is not supported, please contact XUMM Support
error.failed: Failed to fetch, please contact XUMM Support
error.closed: WebSocket closed, please contact XUMM Support
error.websocket: There is a problem with the WebSocket connection, please contact XUMM Support
error.403: Access denied (403), please contact XUMM Support
error.404: Server not found (404), please contact XUMM Support
error.hasObjects: There are account objects that are preventing you from deleting this account. Please ensure there are no TrustLines, pending escrows, offers, signer lists, etc. If you need assistance determining this, please contact XUMM Support
error.equalAccounts: You selected the same account as source and destination account
error.invalidParams: One or more fields are specified incorrectly, or one or more required fields are missing. Please contact XUMM Support
error.lgrNotFound: The ledger specified by the ledger_hash or ledger_index does not exist, or it does exist but the server does not have it. Please contact XUMM Support
error.actNotFound: The Address specified in the account field of the request does not correspond to an account in the XRP Ledger. Please contact XUMM Support
error.temDISABLED: Occurs if the DeletableAccounts amendment is not enabled.
error.temDST_IS_SRC: Occurs if the Destination matches the sender of the transaction (Account field).
error.tecDST_TAG_NEEDED: Occurs if the Destination account requires a destination tag, but the DestinationTag field was not provided.
error.tecNO_DST: Occurs if the Destination account is not a funded account in the XRP Ledger.
error.tecNO_PERMISSION: Occurs if the Destination account requires deposit authorization and the sender is not preauthorized.
error.tecTOO_SOON: Occurs if the sender's Sequence number is too high. The transaction's Sequence number plus 256 must be less than the current Ledger Index.
error.tecHAS_OBLIGATIONS: Occurs if the account to be deleted is connected to objects that cannot be deleted in the ledger. (This includes objects created by other accounts, such as escrows.)
error.tefTOO_BIG: Occurs if the sending account is linked to more than 1000 objects in the ledger. The transaction could succeed on retry if some of those objects were deleted separately first.
